title: aussiefirewx: Explore Australian Fire Weather
text: R package provides small dataset interactive Shiny app explore Fire Weather Index (FWI) Monthly Severity Rating (MSR) trends south-eastern Australia.

title: Fire weather indices for south-eastern Australia, 1979–2020 — se_aus_fwi
text: Illustrative Fire Weather Index (FWI) Monthly Severity Rating (MSR) year south-eastern Australia. Replace processed data available.
